attributes.action: Use London buses at least twice a week and say to the bus driver."Im firteen innit" and then report to his transport minister how many times he got away without paying the fare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people have been given the freedom of Londons bus network for which all they have to do is aquire an oyster card. This has been abused in as much as young people seem to use the buses as a play ground. They cause most of the vandlism, abuse the drivers and other pasengers and our bus fares have increased to an unacceptable level.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
